Directions You have successfully checked in Point estimator km mi Offers coming soon I discovered %s using the DreamTrips app Suggest Restaurant %.1f mi %.1f km Miles Kilometers Show distance in: // TODO : details_points_legal_text below needs translation!!! DreamTrips Points are offered based on a varying percentage of transaction amount at each individual merchant. Offers are subject to change at any time and may vary based on day of the week. Earning DreamTrips Points through DreamTrips Local offers is capped at a maximum of 200 points per transaction and 500 points per day. Variable minimum spend applies before DreamTrips Points will be awarded. Transaction amounts in local currencies are converted to US Dollar based on a conversion rate fixed by WorldVentures at its sole discretion and DreamTrips Points are allocated based on the converted US Dollar amount. Merchant terms and conditions apply for accessing the Perk. // TODO : needs translation!!! Show More // TODO : needs translation!!! Show Less // TODO : needs translation!!!
